entry.text:
[B6A67B]For the period of subscription you will get:[-]
- Double in-game shop point income. - Special stand out shade of green name color in-game. - Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels. - Ability to set second home location ([i]/sethome2 and /home2[/i]). - Access to a [i]/bag[/i] chat command that will take you back to your death location. - Access to [i]/donor[/i] Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches - You are allowed to have 13 land claims (24x24 blocks) placed per map. - Permanent player buffs
[B6A67B]Player Buffs -[-] [679267]Tier 2[-]
- 5% XP Gain increase - 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 5% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 5% loot bonus
